Articles.Content:
After half a week of messing around I finally got the TAC-LS mod installed among others. (I am not computer illiterate I am just not a computer engineer.) The downside is it screwed up my save. The upside is I get to start over!!

EDIT: Just wanted to share my success with everyone. Sooooo happy.

Edited January 14, 2015 by RocketScientistsSon
The world of mods is a wonderful one. Have fun.
